column4: is ubuntu 12.04 x64 default video driver optimizes for dell e6420 or do i need to install bumblebee?
the default drivers and also the nonfree driver ubuntu is offering for nvidia ion is not the best solution, so bumblebee is the way to go
there is a bubmlebee ppa, just enable that ppa and install the bumblebee package after that restart x (or the complete system)
